title: Quarkdown Tokens Schema
description: Schema for layout of token identifiers in Quarkdownâ€™s parsing engine JSON.

tokens.title: Line-Wise Tokens
tokens.description: Tokens processed across an entire line.

shard.title: Token Shard
shard.description: A unique identifier for the token.

kind.title: Token Kind
kind.description: How the token will be processed.

required-ctx.title: Required Context(s)
required-ctx.description: The context(s) that must be active for this token to be activated.

required-idx.title: Required Token Index
required-idx.description: The index of a line the token must appear at to be activated.

opens-ctx.title: Opened Context
opens-ctx.description: The context activated by the token.

ctx-persists.description: Whether this context remains active between line breaks.

ctx-clashes.title: Context Clashes
ctx-clashes.description: The token will not activate if these contexts are active. If set to a boolean, this specifies whether the context clashes with itself.

variables.title: Variable Content
variables.description: Variables to extract from the token.

flags.description: Flags to trigger from the token's activation.

regex-open.title: RegEx Opening Pattern
regex-open.description: The regular expression that activates the context when matched.

html-open.title: HTML Opening Tag
html-open.description: The HTML tag to prepend to the text.

html-replaces.title: HTML Text Replacement
html-replaces.description: The text pattern to replace with the opening HTML tag.

regex-close.title: RegEx Closing Pattern
regex-close.description: The regular expression that deactivates the token when matched.

html-close.title: HTML Closing Tag
html-close.description: The HTML tag to append to the text.

ctx-collapses.title: Context Collapsing
ctx-collapses.description: How many layers to collapse the context stack by after this context is deactivated.
